borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2022/00485/FUL granted 22nd June 2022 for the 'Erection of a rear dormer roof extension; erection of a single storey extension to the side of the main building; demolition and re-building of the single storey side and rear back additions at ground floor level; installation of 2no rooflights in the front roofslope and 1no rooflight in the south side roofslope; replacement of 2no windows with new windows at first floor level and replacement of 1no door with a new window at ground floor level to the rear elevation.' Amendments to include alterations to the rear dormer window to include 2no sash windows in place of 1no window, addition of horizontal glazing bars to bi-folding doors at ground floor, installation of French doors in place of existing sash window to ground floor level, sash windows to be moved upwards at first floor level, and addition of a flat rooflight above the roof of rear dormer.
